project_abstract.cdata: The specific project components are as follows: (a) Interconnection: construction of about 145 km of a 230 kV transmission line for interconnection with Costa Rica. (b) Transmission: Construction of about 22 km of a 138 kV transmission line; construction, addition, and/or conversion of substations with about 122 MVA; relocation of about 75 MVA transformer capacity, and installation of protective and metering equipment; installation of about eight 69 kV circuit breakers. (c) Distribution: Installation of about 65 MVAR capacitors and of distribution lines, transformers, and connections in low income areas. (d) Load Dispatch Center: Construction of a national load dispatch center and installation of equipment to operate the Honduras-Nicaragua-Costa Rica interconnection. (e) Consultants' Services.
